meanings.definition: Surrounded by a raised margin or ridge
meanings.sent1: The vallate cookie had a thick, raised edge.
meanings.sent2: The vallate plate had a border that kept the food from spilling.
meanings.sent3: The vallate pizza crust was like a protective wall around the toppings.
meanings.sent4: Her vallate necklace framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The vallate frame added a touch of elegance to the painting.

meanings.definition: Having a raised rim or edge
meanings.sent1: The vallate cup prevented the hot drink from burning my hand.
meanings.sent2: The vallate lid on the jar made it easy to open.
meanings.sent3: The vallate hat brim shielded her eyes from the sun.
meanings.sent4: The vallate book cover protected the pages from damage.
meanings.sent5: The vallate pillow edge provided extra support for her neck.

meanings.sent1: The vallate garden bed was neatly outlined with stones.
meanings.sent2: The vallate pool was surrounded by a decorative edge.
meanings.sent3: The vallate driveway had a border of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent4: The vallate window frame added charm to the house.
meanings.sent5: The vallate pathway was lined with small pebbles.
